task.title: Move Session
task.shortdesc: Move a session to a different corpus.

step.cmd: Right-click (CTRL+click) on the session you wish to move, choose Move Session To from the context menu, and click on the corpus you wish to move your session to.
step.stepresult: A dialog will appear asking you to confirm that you would like to delete the session from its original location. Click Yes. Your session will be moved to the selected corpus.You may move your session to a corpus within the current project, to another open project, or to any project in your workspace folder.
